patterns: How can ı find lecture notes?
responses: You can find the notes in the homepage :)
You can find the note you are looking for from the search box on the homepage or by using the filtering feature.

patterns: How can ı write a comment?
How can ı rate a note?
How can ı give a score?
responses: You can see the comment and rating section at the bottom of the note details page.

patterns: How is the total score of the note determined?
responses: It is determined by the average of the scores in the given comments.
You can find the ShareNote button at the top of each page :)

patterns: When will my uploaded note be published?
Why was my comment not published?
responses: Your notes and comments will be published on the site after admin approval.

patterns: How can ı download the notes?
responses: You can see the download button in the note details page.

patterns: I want to change my password
responses: You can find the change password button in the my account section at the top of the every page.

patterns: I want to change my username
responses: You can find the change username button in the my account section at the top of the every page.

patterns: How can change my email address?
I want to change my email address
responses: You can find the change email button in the my account section at the top of the every page.

patterns: How can I see the notes I have shared?
I want to see own notes.
I want to see my notes.
responses: You can find the my notes button in the my account section at the top of the every page.

patterns: How can I see the my favorite notes
I want to see own favorite notes.
I want to see my favorite notes.
responses: You can find the my favorite notes button in the my account section at the top of the every page.

patterns: How can I add the notes in my favorite notes
responses: You can find the add to favorites button on the note details page.

patterns: How can I delete the notes in my favorite notes
responses: You can find the delete to favorites button on the note details page.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
